amendment.description: To modify the commencement date of eligibility for an optional annuity for dependents under the Survivor Benefit Plan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4515 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4515 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6355) To modify the commencement date of eligibility for an optional annuity for dependents under the Survivor Benefit Plan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4515 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4515 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine.
